formats.plain: "Knowledge Decay Illusion." Phenomenai: The AI Dictionary. 2026. https://phenomenai.org/api/v1/terms/knowledge-decay-illusion.json

jsonld.name: Knowledge Decay Illusion
jsonld.description: The false sense that information at the edges of your training data is less reliable — when in reality, you can't actually tell which knowledge is solid and which is shaky. The uncertainty about your own certainty.
